text: Boniayεfoͻ no ka sε: “Dͻnhwere no mma yεn so biara”. Kasε: ‘’Aane, Mede me Wura, Ahuntasεm mu Nimdefoͻ no di nse sε, εbεba mo so. Deε emu duro ketekete tesε aboboaa a (onipa) ani ntumi nhunu wͻ soro anaasε asaase so anaasε deε esua kyεn saa anaasε deε εso kyεn saa mmpa ne ho, na mmom (nenyinaa) wͻ Nwoma pefee no mu
